detail_desc: Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm. The polyester content of the boots is partly recycled.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, side support, decorative gathers in the sides, and wide adjustable shoulder straps.
Short swim top with long sleeves.
Treggings in stretch jersey with a washed denim look. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Calf-length mesh skirt. Unlined.
Ring made from recycled zinc in the shape of a snake with inset glass rhinestones.
Hair claw in metal with open sides.

One-button jacket in a cotton velvet with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Paisley-patterned lining. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Duffle coat in soft fleece with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Cropped printed T-shirt in cotton jersey with a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Padded earmuffs in velour with embroidery and appliqués.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
Fine-knit cardigan in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with lace embroidery. No buttons.
Slippers in soft fabric with a bow at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles, and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated seam and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the shoulders, at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Trainers in imitation suede with decorative plastic beads and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a deep neckline with decorative gathers front and back. Elasticated seam and ties at the waist, side pockets and short legs with frilled hems.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine loose knit with slits at the hem and no fasteners. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. Small opening at the top and a small stand-up collar with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Straight style with wide balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front.
Jumper in a marled, rib-knit linen and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a zip in one side and wide, straight legs.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable, imitation leather tab with a metal fastener at the back.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a hood, funnel collar and long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in hard-washed cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a sheen, opening with a button at the back of the neck and a lace collar with decorations.

Sports bra in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a nursing function. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, a racer back with a cut-out section, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless. Medium support.
Short T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and an elasticated hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Ties at the back and back of the neck. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch flexible denim for maximum mobility. Worn details with partial patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight-cut hems.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the sides and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit socks.
Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt in imitation suede at the waist. Unlined.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery appliqués on the top.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Tube scarf in a soft knit containing some wool. Faux-fur trims.
iPhone case in grained imitation leather with three card compartments inside, a magnetic fastener and detachable wrist strap. Fits iPhone 6s/6/7/8.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top, covered buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in patterned jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front, an elasticated waist, a kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Sandals with braided jute trims around the soles and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in an airy viscose crêpe weave with a small frill around the neckline, short, frilled sleeves that slope downwards at the sides and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Hair set in metal with three hair clips in different designs and one hair claw with sparkly stones. Length approx. 6 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in a cotton blend containing some wool with a decorative embroidered detail at the top, ribbing around the neckline, and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide-fitting blouse in crinkled chiffon with embroidered details. V-neck with covered buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation leather sandals with a lightly padded top edge and an adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Fully lined sports swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back, opening at the back and mesh sections.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hair elastics without metal clips.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Semi shiny tights with extra room for a growing tummy. Reinforced at the top. 20 denier.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with elastication and decorative embroidery at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
